title: What's the best way to build an online sales funnel for network marketing? - Quora

response.answer_text: You should stay away from it. Network marketing or Mult-Level-Marketing is a business model designed to fail. The only people who really benefit are those that get in on the ground floor/creators. Another issue is that people may not be looking for the actual product or products you are locked into promoting. The products could also be crap, which means crazy refunds. I’m going to set my personal feeling aside now. If the product isn’t crap and you feel okay promoting it, you could look for related forums or learn how to make money blogging and use a blog to promote it. That way, your earnings would be residual — if people actually are looking for what you’re promoting. Good luck.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Frank Anthony Caruso, Jr.

response.answer_text: I tried out 4 different sales funnel platforms before I found one that worked well for my network marketing business. This video will explain everything I learned about that!
